resources.Resource: mail.transport.protocol=smtp mail.smtp.socketFactory.class=javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory mail.smtp.socketFactory.fallback=false mail.smtp.host=smtp.gmail.com mail.smtp.port=465 mail.smtp.auth=true mail.smtp.user=anybody@gmail.com mail.from=anybody@gmail.com password=_a_password_ mail.debug=true
